layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x140
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x140
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x116
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 147x18
          text run at (0,0) width 147: "COL WIDTH=relative"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,34) size 300x82 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 298x80
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 298x76
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 144x76 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 139x72
                text run at (2,2) width 139: "Table width is 300px."
                text run at (2,20) width 128: "This column should"
                text run at (2,38) width 110: "be 1/2 as wide as"
                text run at (2,56) width 125: "Column 2 or 100px"

                text run at (2,2) width 139: "Table width is 300px."
                text run at (2,20) width 128: "This column should"
                text run at (2,38) width 124: "be twice as wide as"
                text run at (2,56) width 125: "Column 1 or 200px"
